title: Professional Complaint Handling
description: Turn customer complaints into opportunities for excellent service recovery

phrases.english: Thank you for bringing this to my attention
You're absolutely right to be concerned about this
phrases.spanish: Tiene toda la razón en preocuparse por esto
phrases.pronunciation: tee-EH-neh TOH-dah lah rah-SON en preh-oh-koo-PAR-seh por ES-toh

phrases.english: What can I do to make this right?
phrases.pronunciation: keh PWEH-doh ah-SER PAH-rah koh-reh-HEER ES-toh

phrases.english: I will personally ensure this doesn't happen again
phrases.spanish: Personalmente me aseguraré de que esto no vuelva a ocurrir
phrases.pronunciation: per-soh-nal-MEN-teh meh ah-seh-goo-rah-REH deh keh ES-toh noh VWEL-vah ah oh-koo-REER

phrases.spanish: He registrado esto y lo he reportado a soporte

culturalNotes.note: Excellent complaint handling can result in better ratings than if nothing went wrong
culturalNotes.colombianComparison: US customers appreciate proactive problem-solving and accountability

culturalNotes.note: Customer complaints are about the service, not about you - stay professional
culturalNotes.colombianComparison: Less personal than Colombian culture; focus on solution not relationship

culturalNotes.note: Use app features to document issues and your resolution attempts
culturalNotes.colombianComparison: More formal documentation than verbal Colombian dispute resolution

practicalScenarios.spanishResponse: Tiene razón y me disculpo. Esto no cumple con mis estándares. Permítame limpiar esto inmediatamente, o si prefiere, puedo cancelar sin cargo para usted.
practicalScenarios.englishTranslation: You're right and I apologize. This doesn't meet my standards. Let me clean this immediately, or if you prefer, I can cancel with no charge to you.
practicalScenarios.tips: Acknowledge, apologize, offer immediate solution plus alternative

practicalScenarios.spanishResponse: Lamento mucho si mis palabras sonaron groseras - no fue mi intención en absoluto. Su comodidad es importante para mí. ¿Cómo puedo mejorar el resto de su experiencia?
practicalScenarios.englishTranslation: I'm very sorry if my words sounded rude - that wasn't my intention at all. Your comfort is important to me. How can I improve the rest of your experience?
practicalScenarios.tips: Don't argue about intent - apologize for impact and refocus on service

practicalScenarios.situation: Delivery order is incorrect (not your fault)
practicalScenarios.spanishResponse: Tiene toda la razón en estar molesto. Aunque no empaqué el pedido, lo reportaré inmediatamente y haré todo lo posible para ayudar a resolver esto con el restaurante y soporte.
practicalScenarios.englishTranslation: You're absolutely right to be upset. Although I didn't pack the order, I'll report this immediately and do everything I can to help resolve this with the restaurant and support.
practicalScenarios.tips: Validate feelings, clarify role, commit to advocacy
